mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_writer, notice_category, notice_title, notice_content, notice_point) values(#{noticeWriter}, #{noticeCategory}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticePoint})
mapper.select: select * from notice where notice_del='N' and notice_num=#{noticeNum}

select * from notice where notice_del='N' and notice_point='N'
order by notice_num desc limit #{pageStart}, #{qty}
select * from notice where notice_del='N' and notice_point='Y' order by notice_num desc
mapper.update: update notice set notice_count = notice_count + #{cnt} where notice_num = #{noticeNum}
update notice set notice_del='Y' where notice_num=#{noticeNum}
mapper.select: select count(notice_num) from notice where notice_del='N'
select notice_title ,notice_reg_at,notice_num from notice where notice_category = "공지사항" AND notice_del = "N" order by notice_num desc LIMIT 2
